_05_table src/sass/guide/_05_table.scss

ボーダーなし

table table table
table table table
table table table
table table table 
 選択<table class="table">
	<thead>
		<tr>
			<th>table</th>
			<th>table</th>
			<th>table</th>
		</tr>
	</thead>
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<th>table</th>
			<td>table</td>
			<td>table</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<th>table</th>
			<td>table</td>
			<td>table</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<th>table</th>
			<td>table</td>
			<td>table</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

レスポンシブ

table_stripe table_stripe table_stripe table_stripe table_stripe
table_stripe table_stripe table_stripe table_stripe 
 選択<div class="table_responsive">
	<table class="table">
		<thead>
			<tr>
				<th>table_stripe</th>
				<th>table_stripe</th>
				<th>table_stripe</th>
				<th>table_stripe</th>
				<th>table_stripe</th>
			</tr>
		</thead>
		<tbody>
			<tr>
				<th>table_stripe</th>
				<td>table_stripe</td>
				<td>table_stripe</td>
				<td>table_stripe</td>
			</tr>
		</tbody>
	</table>
</div>
